title: Looking for Dots, (in all the wrong places)
author: yanks87

posts.post_title: Looking for Dots, (in all the wrong places)
posts.post_content:
Sometimes you pursue collections, sometimes they find you.  This is the latter.  I am attempting my first back run on a card because of some great finds recently, and one player that kept popping up.  Dots Miller.

I am currently looking for Dots Miller T206 - nothing pretty, but they definitely need some of the back for identification.  Let me know what you have!

looking for:
Polar Bear
Sweet Caporal 350/25
Broadleaf
Cycle
Tolstoi

thanks!
best of luck from one dots runner to another!!!

[quote name="ullmandds" post=2236503]best of luck from one dots runner to another!!![/QUOTE]

Thank you! I came across a T213 and figured it belonged as well. It’s a fun run so far, glad to hear there are others in the Dots Matrix!
